metadata.title: CVE-2021-47407 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: KVM:x86: Handle SRCU initialization failure during page track init Check thereturn of init_srcu_struct(), which can fail due to OOM, when initializingthe page track mechanism. Lack of checking leads to a NULL pointer dereffound by a modified syzkaller. [Move the call towards the beginning ofkvm_arch_init_vm. - Paolo]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
